short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spice up your browser with interactive animated links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will grab relevant gifs for every link on every page, and uses tholman's script to display them when moused over. It can be temporarily enabled/disabled in the upper right corner of chrome, or uninstalled via chrome://extensions.
